name: dept
sql: CREATE TABLE dept(  deptno number(2,0),  dname  varchar2(14),  loc    varchar2(13),  constraint pk_dept primary key (deptno))

name: emp
sql: CREATE TABLE emp(  empno    number(4,0),  ename    varchar2(10),  job      varchar2(9),  mgr      number(4,0),  hiredate date,  sal      number(7,2),  comm     number(7,2),  deptno   number(2,0),  constraint pk_emp primary key (empno),  constraint fk_deptno foreign key (deptno) references dept (deptno))
